text: maq ityA#ha saviqtRupra#sUta Eqva dEqvatA$ByO niqvEdyAqpO&cCai$tyaqpa i#Shya hOtaqrityA#hEShiqta(gm) hi karma# kriqyatEq maitrA#varuNasya camasAddhvaryaqvA draqvEtyA#ha miqtrAvaru#Nauq vA aqpAM nEqtArauq tAByA#mEqvainAq acCai#tiq dEvI#rApO apAM napAqdityAqhA&&*hu#tyaiqvainA# niqShkrIya# gRuhNAqtyathO# haqviShkRu#tAnA-mEqvABiGRu#tAnAM gRuhNAtiq- [  ] 14
